title: They Got Duped - All dupes mailed on 2/21
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: They Got Duped - All dupes mailed on 2/21
posts.post_content:
Ooops, that should have been get dupes, my dupes.

Fore sale, ooops, for sale are the following foursome.;)

Rube Kroh - EX BVG 5 with a Peidmont 350 back has been SOLD.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/17250/kroh[/IMG]

Fred Clarke HOF - GD SGC 30 with a Piedmont 150 back has been SOLD.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/19177/clarke-f-hof[/IMG]

George Perring - VG+ - BVG 3.5 with a Piedmont 350 back has been SOLD.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10182/perring[/IMG]

Larry Doyle Portrait - VG - SGC 40 with a Sweet Caporal Fact 42 overstrike back has been SOLD.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10043/doyle-portrait[/IMG]

These cards are guaranteed duplicates, but are not labelled as such.  

Deduct a full $2 if you buy 2, $4 if you buy 3 or $6 if you take them all.

Use your Frank Bucks to deduct up to 10% as well.

Or just pay for the cards after I figure out what the price is.:confused:

All forms of no fee payment are tolerated.  A paypal surcharge of about 3% will be added for regular Paypal.

Remember hagglers may be stragglers and "I'll take it" will make it yours.
Ill take him if available.... PM coming
